message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay $120 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to $125.  Would that work for you?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $120 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
